short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy To Clipboard Anyting You Want To Save!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You have a few options to choose from:

- Enter the text manually into the field.

- Highlight the text you wish to copy, right-click, and select the "Copy to clipboard" option.

-Copy the URL of the page you're on.
